  * When you're blocking C&C 4 from firewall, make sure you allow connection
    to 127.0.0.1 (loopback to your PC), or else the game won't work.
	1. Open the "hosts" file located in the folder "\System32\drivers\etc" in notepad,
	and add the following text:
	127.0.0.1 gosredirector.ea.com
	127.0.0.1 blazeserver.blazeemu.org
	127.0.0.1 gosgvaprod-qos01.ea.com
	127.0.0.1 gosiadprod-qos01.ea.com
	127.0.0.1 gossjcprod-qos01.ea.com
	127.0.0.1 demangler.ea.com
	127.0.0.1 vmp.tools.gos.ea.com
  * You can update the game by running the original CNC4.exe,
    so back it up.
  * The BONUS PRE-ORDER mission is available.

  1. Unrar.
  2. Burn or mount the image.
  3. Install the game. 
  4. Copy over the cracked content.
  5. Play the game.
